id.description: the id of the scheduled event

guild_id.description: the guild id which the scheduled event belongs to

channel_id.description: the channel id in which the scheduled event will be hosted, or null if scheduled entity type is EXTERNAL
channel_id.note-field: See field requirements by entity type to understand the relationship between entity_type and the following fields: channel_id, entity_metadata, and scheduled_end_time

creator_id.description: the id of the user that created the scheduled event *
creator_id.note-field: creator_id will be null and creator will not be included for events created before October 25th, 2021, when the concept of creator_id was introduced and tracked.

name.description: the name of the scheduled event (1-100 characters)

description.description: the description of the scheduled event (1-1000 characters)

scheduled_start_time.description: the time the scheduled event will start

scheduled_end_time.description: the time the scheduled event will end, required if entity_type is EXTERNAL
scheduled_end_time.note-field: See field requirements by entity type to understand the relationship between entity_type and the following fields: channel_id, entity_metadata, and scheduled_end_time

privacy_level.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

status.description: the status of the scheduled event

entity_type.description: the type of the scheduled event

entity_id.description: the id of an entity associated with a guild scheduled event

entity_metadata.description: additional metadata for the guild scheduled event
entity_metadata.note-field: See field requirements by entity type to understand the relationship between entity_type and the following fields: channel_id, entity_metadata, and scheduled_end_time

creator.description: the user that created the scheduled event

user_count.description: the number of users subscribed to the scheduled event

image.description: the cover image hash of the scheduled event

guild_scheduled_event_id.description: the scheduled event id which the user subscribed to

user.description: user which subscribed to an event

member.description: guild member data for this user for the guild which this event belongs to, if any
